snippet.title: Evercade Toaplan Arcade 1 Trailer
snippet.description:
Eight great games from Toaplan are coming to Evercade.

This first arcade collection features some early formative games from the Japanese developer like Guardian, and later fun platformers and puzzlers including Snow Bros and Teki-Paki.

But it's shooters that Toaplan are known for and we're bringing five incredible games from Toaplan's catalogue, including: Alcon (Slap Fight) Tiger-Heli, Flying Shark, Zero Wing and Truxton.

These games will be supported by the Evercade EXP's new TATE mode, meaning you can experience these games the way they were meant to be played.

Available to pre-order in September 2022, or as part of the Evercade EXP Limited Edition from Funstock.co.uk from June 1st 2022, ahead of a Winter 2022 release.
